attributes.action: wipe all student loans after 25 years regardless of when the student started university.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students that started university between 1998 and 2006 have to make student loan payments until they reach 65. However, all other student loans are wiped 25 years after graduation (Typically aged 46-47). This is a petition to ask the Prime Minister to treat all students and former students equally by wiping ALL loans 25 years after graduation.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "wipe all student loans after 25 years regardless of when the student started university."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22224
